fields.name: statusReason
fields.description: Reason the immunization was not performed.
fields.note: This is generally only used for the status of "not-done".

binding.description: Reason the immunization was not performed.

fields.name: vaccineCode
fields.description: The vaccine that was administered or was to be administered.

binding.note: The CVX binding is always returned. An NDC binding is returned when available.
